entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
